localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: OSINT-tool.com is two things. 1) A website where you can look up things using either public available links, or your favorite enrichment provider via APIs and 2) a Chrome extension that allows you highlight text or images and enrich it using 1)
nodes.title: OSINT Tool - Chrome extension looks up phone/email/IP/people via APIs
nodes.author: Roelof Temmingh

nodes.excerpt: You can easily organize a raffle via yilbasicekilisi.online, send matching results to participants' emails.
nodes.title: Christmas Raffle - Organize a raffle for Christmas
nodes.author: Bugrahan Saka

nodes.excerpt: ParrotBay provides a unique URL that you can execute any type of HTTP requests against it. allows you to inspect your HTTP requests, design webhooks, and mimic your entire backend endpoints with static and dynamic JSON responses.
nodes.title: ParrotBay - HTTP request inspection, mocked API response, HTTP proxy
nodes.author: Ilya Vinokurov

nodes.excerpt: Planning travel is hard, workations even more so. What if the top travel influencers planned your workation and vacation experiences? Blogs, too long Reels, too short Travelcase, just right Quick comprehensive guides to get you to your next destination!
nodes.title: Travelcase - Workations simplified, quick guides from travel influencers
nodes.author: Pranav Singhania

nodes.excerpt: EmailEngine is a self-hosted application that opens IMAP and SMTP connections against registered email accounts to translate API requests to IMAP commands, send emails, and monitor changes on these accounts. It sends a webhook for every update on the account.
nodes.title: EmailEngine - Access any email account to receive/send emails with an API
nodes.author: Andris Reinman

nodes.excerpt: OtpNinja is a Plug and play Otp service for Apps And businesses who wish to add 2Auth layer and send code Verification By sms for their clients. The Api is super easy creates and send the code by SMS also send back to the app the Verification results.
nodes.title: OtpNinja - Setup OTP API easily

nodes.excerpt: With the help of our product, you can no longer carry a heavy briefcase. Books, notebooks, diaries and tests will be available in just one click
nodes.title: WebBag - Educational platform for easy learning
nodes.author: Ruslan

nodes.excerpt: We hated cold outreach because most of the tools are either too complicated or they need a lot of other tools parallel to make the outreach work. So, we decided to simplify the cold outreach process for marketers. Welcome to GetMails Family â¤ï¸
nodes.title: GetMails - Making cold outreach simple for everyone
nodes.author: Saurabh Chauhan

nodes.excerpt: Celebrate 2021 Christmas by adding a Santa hat to your social media profile picture on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Tiktok. We remove your background & add cool background images & effects automatically!
nodes.title: Santa Hat Profile Pic Maker - Add a Christmas Santa hat on your profile picture for free
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

nodes.excerpt: Paperback is a simpler and tidier alternative to wiki pages. Instead of burying stuff in deep hierarchies, it lets you create concise lists with your links, files, and notes. Then, people can actually find what they need, instead of asking around all the time.
nodes.title: Paperback - Simpler and tidier alternative to wiki pages

nodes.excerpt: Say goodbye to flat text â€œsecure notesâ€ to store anything thatâ€™s not a password. Hypervault offers the solution for businesses to securely store, share and organize many types of sensitive data, not just passwords. Great for IT, Devs, Agencies, and Startups!
nodes.title: Hypervault - Securely manage and share sensitive data with your team

nodes.excerpt: Turn your boring QR codes into catchy artworks. No worries, they will still work the same way as your original codes. Just provide a QR code and a selfie and get ready to share its Toon version with everybody!
nodes.title: QRToon - Toonified QR Maker - Turn your boring QR codes into catchy artwork

nodes.excerpt: An affordable, all-in-one cybersecurity platform built for small business. Get peace of mind through a dozen tools in one dashboard offering vulnerability scans, global password manager, antivirus/anti-malware threat protection, policy management and more.
nodes.title: Havoc Shield - All-in-One Cybersecurity Platform: 12 Tools in 1 Dashboard

nodes.title: SaaS Advent Calendar 2021 - Unlock exclusive SaaS deals each day of advent

nodes.excerpt: 250+ trends for 2022 from 70+ recently released trend reports. ft: Accenture, Benedict Evans, Deloitte, Dentsu, Forrester, Forbes, Fjord, Gartner, Instagram, McKinsey, Next Atlas, Ogilvy, PWC, Pinterest, Springwise, Sparks & Honey, Trendhunter, Unity, & more.

nodes.title: Multiversial - Tech & business news to become smarter daily in Spanish
nodes.author: Carlos Molina

nodes.excerpt: Weâ€™re building Opal for anyone whoâ€™s primary connection to their job â€“ their team, their employees, their customers â€“ is through video calls. We want to make it easy for everyone to have a professional setup, with a single plug and play system.
nodes.title: Opal C1 - The first professional webcamera that helps you look better.

nodes.excerpt: Forget about overused faces from stock photos. Forget about photos with an inappropriate license. Change faces or bodies and use them in ads, e-commerce, social media, education, glossy magazines, etc. Exceptional quality. Unrivaled resolution.

nodes.excerpt: Ripple is a mood tracking app that helps people improve their mental health by getting rid of anxiety, depression, and toxicity. Just choose your satisfaction and energy level on a scale of 1 to 10. Ripple will translate your emotions and put them into words!
nodes.title: Ripple - Take control of your emotions and win the day, every day

nodes.excerpt: For anyone running workloads on AWS, Azure, and GCP, AutoCloud automates architecture diagrams, compliance checks, and drift detection. Explore insights using a 3D environment or by querying a GraphQL endpoint.

nodes.excerpt: Magic Sidebar is the best browser extension for Twitter. Use it today and unlock insights you never knew about, communicate better with your audience, and build strong 1:1 relationships. Mobile apps for iOS and Android are also available!
nodes.title: Magic Sidebar by BlackMagic.so - Powerful enhanced experience for Twitter

nodes.excerpt: No more writers block. Don't stay stuck wondering how to open your lesson, article or video. Automatically generate great opening hooks, stories and relevant examples about anything you want to teach or write about!
nodes.title: Creativity Booster by Alpe Audio - Find stories & examples for your teaching & content

nodes.excerpt: Sprinkle up your seasonal content with these festive goodies. Here come the elves with a Christmas freebie full of design assets that are perfect for your holiday newsletters, presentations & social media posts.

nodes.excerpt: HiHo is a face-forward social app for meeting interesting people and having great video conversations. With asynchronous replies and infinite threading, everyone can participate at any time. The app offers both public forums as well as private DMs.
nodes.title: HiHo - Asynchronous video discussion forums with infinite threading
nodes.author: Ryan Hoover

nodes.excerpt: CommerceBooster is the first open-source, UI template for B2B eCommerce. Itâ€™s available for free on the Figma Community and optimized for commercetools and Vue Storefront. It literally saves months of work for anyone starting B2B eCommerce projects.
